TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MailWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider
Public MustInherit Class MailWebEventProvider Inherits BufferedWebEventProvider

summary.span: 提供基本功能，用于创建发送电子邮件的事件提供程序。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for creating event providers that send email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况数据的运行状况事件类型，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是构建提供程序的基类，用于监视 Web 事件并发送所选事件的电子邮件。The class is a base class for building providers that monitor Web events and send email for selected events. 此类支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，不应在代码中直接继承或使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be inherited from or used directly from your code. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅 [如何：实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms178718(v=vs.140))。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms178718(v=vs.140)).

related.span: 安装和配置 ASP.NET 提供程序

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);

param.span: 配置文件中用于标识此提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 ，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以 通过配置文件中指定的配置设置和名称初始化。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

exception.span: 在 中未分配任何收件人。

span.span: No recipients have been assigned in .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用来开始处理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event.

para.span: 如果已启用缓冲，则必须处理向缓冲区添加事件。

span.span: If buffering is enabled, you must handle adding events to the buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEventFlush(class System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo flushInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEventFlush (flushInfo As WebEventBufferFlushInfo)

param.name: flushInfo
param.span: 包含等待发送其通知的事件计数的 。

span.span: The that contains the count of events waiting to send their notification.

summary.span: 从提供程序的缓冲区中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当需要事件缓冲区刷新时，运行状况监视系统会调用此方法。This method is called by the health-monitoring system when an event buffer flush is required. 刷新事件缓冲区时，会发生通知，并将整个事件缓冲区发送到尽可能少的消息中的收件人，而不考虑上次通知之后所经过的时间长度。When the event buffer is flushed, a notification occurs and the entire event buffer is sent to the recipients in as few messages as possible, regardless of the length of time elapsed since the last notification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在 承载 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止时调用方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 调用方法来执行允许应用程序正常结束的任务。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully.
